C

calculateDrinkCost(int, int, int, boolean) - Static method in class App
This method calculates the price of the drink that you ordered, depending on the specific drink, size, amount of espresso shots.
calculateTip(double, int) - Static method in class App
This method allows us to calculate the tip that the person chose, this is using the choice that they made and also the cost of their drink to calculate the tip amount.

Gives you a nice readable printout of the price of everything in your bill.

This prints out the start of the program, and asks the user for their choice of coffee.
